name: Conke Vs. Bepis
description: You are a small bit of Conke that was administered into a bottle of Bepis. This was done to see if Conke can take over a bottle of Bepis as  well as it can take over a bottle of fatna. Click to shoot, mouse to aim. I do not know why it asks you for your microphone. If you haven't figured it out yet, I chose to do a lot of Bepis. Made for the quarantine jam in less than 24 hours.
